parameters: What's wrong? Did you forget something?
(Uh... I probably forgot to put the lid back on
the pot. But it's not gonna matter, is it?)
Good morning, Yellow. Are you going to the fair?
I heard that there was a stir at the fair, so
I'd better not go there today.
Hey, how many times have I told you not to just
walk into people's homes? Good grief, enough
with that bad habit of trespassing like that!
And where's my dog run off to now...?
Hey, how many times have I told you not to just
walk into people's homes? Good grief, enough
with that bad habit of trespassing like that!
And where's my dog run off to now...?
Oh, oh? My dog is wandering around on the route
to the south of the town? Thanks for telling me
Here, take these. You said you haven't had your
It's rare to see you up so early. See you at the
There's always a whole lot of fancy stuff from
other regions at the fair these days. I bet
Good morning, Officer! The pass is full of
foreign visitors... Alas, so much chaos.
The fair ought to be in the south ...Better go
to the fair first. It'll be over soon.
The Scarlet Hero... he used to live in Pallet
That was a long time ago.
Stop messing around. Let's hurry to the stables.

The fair is just ahead of here.
This month's Kanto Pass Fairs will be held on:
recently. Please report anything unusual to the
...LOST DOG. A reward will be given to whoever
Thank goodness! Master Green is still here!
Was there any trouble at the fair? I was about
to go back there on patrol.
Y-Yes, there was. The marketplace is a mess
But... I was the one who caused it...
There was a sword sticking out in a stone at the
edge of the forest, and everyone said that it
was the one used by the Scarlet Hero, and Miss
Blue egged on me to pull the sword out, so I
thought I'd give it a try, but then I just
Master, is this truly the Scarlet Hero's sword?
What are you talking about? The Scarlet
The sword, which had just been pulled out of the
It didn't seem like it could be the powerful
...that was sung of in the legend of the Scarlet
...Is that reliable information? I've heard too
I don't know. I heard it when I was with...
(Seems like Miss Blue doesn't want to meet
...When I was among the crowd, I heard it from a
gentleman who also used to be an adventurer in
Since *that guy* became famous, there have been
more and more such madcaps venturing into the
Yes... There were many such people gathered at
the clearing at the east of the fair, near the
A lot of them tried to draw the sword, but none
of them could pull it out.
But when I stepped in front of the sword,
I suddenly felt like I heard *his* voice. He
said that he was waiting for me and asked me to
That must have been a hallucination.
...Maybe it was. But, somehow, by the time I
came back to myself, the sword was already in my
I didn't know what to do, so I ran back here.
He's been missing for so many years now. How
could you just somehow hear his voice? Has he
Hmph. Well, things like this have been happening
However, they turned out to be either traps set
by bandits or lies spread by those so-called
We don't know where this sword came from, and it
isn't a good sword, either. You shouldn't use
this. I'll go with you to have it thrown away.
Perhaps it was because I was holding the sword
so tightly that it started to get hotter in my
hands.A slight vibration buzzed from the hilt to
The shape of the sword changed!!!
Master, Master Green... D-Did you see it? Is
I've packed some things you might need. Take
By the way, there is a set of clothes inside
You don't want to dress like this for a long
Oh, right! I'll go change right now!
Thank you, Master Green. It fits well.
Yes, I have everything that I need with me.
Food, medicinal herbs, a blanket, and, ummm...
If it rains, I have my hat.
And the "Hero's Sword"! There's no sheath for
it, so I wrapped it with some leather, the way
B-But, Master! I haven't learned how to use a
Just follow your instinct and fight.
Don't care about winning or losing!
You did better than I expected. Good job.
Let's go. I'll walk you to the stables.
(The only things I'd learned so far were some
self-defense skills. He must be worried.)
I'll do my best. Hopefully, Master Chuck will
Let's go. I'll walk you to the stables.

parameters: I told you not to call me that. Well, at least
Ah! I'm so sorry! I just got used to it, so...
Besides, I've only taught you some basic self-
defense skills. That's far from being a master.
Right...! Did you just get back from patrolling
That's right. People from all over the world
have come here today, so we've got to be
vigilant. I'm just about to go back to the
sheriff's office to give my report of this
morning's patrol. Are you going to the fair
Yes. I haven't eaten my breakfast yet, though.

(I saw him in my dream again. It wasn't quite

(It seemed like he was talking to me...)

Um... it's nothing! Well, I'm off to the fair
